message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. My initial offer is $1,100,000.

While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $1,100,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go over $850,000. This is my best offer, and I hope we can find a way to make it work.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm eager to hear your response.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice.  $950,000 is still a bit higher than I can go. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $850,000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
